**Example**

This example replaces any occurrence of the word "World" with the word "Universe":

```esql
ROW str = "Hello World"
| EVAL str = REPLACE(str, "World", "Universe")
| KEEP str
```

| str:keyword |
| --- |
| Hello Universe |
